title: Knowledge Transfer Strategy Design for International Joint Ventures

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: An online asynchronous training program conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment for current professionals, with project-based assessments to validate practical application skills.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the key differences between explicit/implicit knowledge transfer from a structural equation modeling perspective
Learners can analyze the impact of foreign parent companies' knowledge dissemination capabilities on joint ventures in relation to psychological distance variables
Learners can design structural models to measure knowledge transfer effectiveness in international joint ventures using real-case data

resources: Access Permissions for Collaboration Tools (Slack/Google Drive, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
